```{r setup, include=FALSE}
m2 = read.csv("r_objects/v2_cleaned_ed_data.csv")
view(m2)
m2[100:110,]

m3 = m2 %>%
  filter(Group == "All Students")


testing = m3
testing = testing %>%
  mutate(across(.cols = everything(), .fns = ~ifelse(is.na(.x), 0,.x)))
sapply(testing, function(x) sum(x<0))
```
